meanings.definition: The quality or ability of being able to be sewn.
meanings.sent1: The sewability of this fabric makes it perfect for making clothes.
meanings.sent2: When choosing a fabric, consider its sewability to ensure a successful project.
meanings.sent3: I never knew the importance of sewability until I tried to sew a slippery fabric!
meanings.sent4: The sewability of this thread is like a smooth journey through fabric.
meanings.sent5: Her dressmaker skills were unmatched, thanks to her understanding of sewability.

meanings.definition: The ease or difficulty of sewing a particular material.
meanings.sent1: The sewability of denim is different from that of silk.
meanings.sent2: Consider the sewability of the fabric before starting your sewing project.
meanings.sent3: I underestimated the sewability of this thick material and broke my needle!
meanings.sent4: The sewability of this fabric is like trying to sew through butter.
meanings.sent5: Her frustration grew as she struggled with the sewability of the delicate lace.
